response.overview: Cookies is a film series that follows the journey of two best friends through the phases of their lives — filled with blunders, tight spots, and most importantly, deep knowledge and the true power of friendship. In this chapter of the saga, the Cookies celebrate 10 years of friendship (Can you believe it’s been that long?), and in this new adventure, they find themselves in a whole new universe, destined to protect the world from a wave of demons that have terrorized the population for generations. And how will they save the world? Through music — with their newly formed Lady Gaga cover band. #DISEASE #SOTY But what the Cookies least expected was the return of a new demon, born from their worst nightmares: Julia Cavalcanti is back, ready to haunt their lives in the most terrifying ways. But one thing’s for sure — the Cookies will find a way.
response.title: Cookies 10 - Cookies Demon Hunters
